title: Noam Chomsky Rocks MIT Fossil Fuel Divestment
description:
On April 28, 2015, MIT Institute Professor and "World's top public intellectual" of 2005 Noam Chomsky presented "Science at MIT: From the Cold War to the Climate Crisis" to a packed house of 450 people.

Watch him explain why "divestment is a very good idea" and blow the counterarguments out of the water.

This event was hosted by MIT's Radius and Science For The People.
http://radius.mit.edu/programs/science-mit-cold-war-climate-crisis
